rootCause: Raspberry Pi 5 renames the primary Ethernet interface to end0 so k3s-discover kept probing eth0, failed to find an IPv4 address, and aborted bootstrap after the self-check never observed its own advertisement.
resolution: Auto-detect the active IPv4 interface before publishing mDNS advertisements and expand the end-to-end test harness to emulate end0 so the regression is covered in CI.
